name: Gallaleon (Final Year Student Project)
description:
This is Mega Man inspired final year student project made using Game Maker and was made in 6 months.

The game is about the titular character, Gallaleon, testing out a couple of new scenarios installed into the prototype Virtual Reality (VR) system that he's in charge of testing and maintaining.

The game has all of the basic jump and shoot mechanics the Mega Man games have, along with a slide ability to move faster and to move through narrow spaces.

There are only two stages in this game, each ending with a boss.

Default Controls

  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Z
  • Shoot - X
  • Slide - ↓ + Z or C
  • Pause - Space Bar

*This game has custom controls for those who wish to set their own controls.

CHANGELOG

  • Fixed a pit in the first level where the player doesn't die when they fall into it and hits the final checkpoint.

This game is made with an open source engine called the Mega Engine created by WreckingPrograms.

The Mega Engine is a free open-source Classic Mega Man engine for Game Maker Studio 2, Game Maker Studio 1.4 and Game Maker 8.1, built around the idea of combining accuracy to the original games with being flexible and easy-to-use.
